# Libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Overview 



# Data 
```{r}
df1_raw <- read_csv(here::here("data", "ScopingReviewOfOpioi-FinalResults_DATA_2020-07-06_1942.csv"))

nrow(df1_raw)
# str(df1_raw)
names(df1_raw)
```

## Data wrangling
```{r}
df2_clean <- 
    df1_raw %>% 
    mutate(country_income_check = country_income___1 + 
               country_income___2 + 
               country_income___3 + 
               country_income___4
           )

df2_clean %>% 
    filter(country_yn == 1) %>% 
    count(country_income_check)

```


# Counts 
```{r}
table(df1_raw$country_yn)
df1_raw %>% count(country)
```
